DOC.brief_summary: Study aim test whether nano-composite CAD/CAM mill restoration similar performance clinical service conventional ceramic CAD/CAM restoration .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Chairside CAD/CAM Nano-ceramic Restorations
DOC.criteria: Patient 18 year age To least one carious lesion defective restoration molar premolar tooth , cavity large enough warrant mill restoration either crown onlay Teeth vital asymptomatic Devital sensitive teeth Teeth root canal treatment Patients significant untreated dental disease include periodontitis rampant caries Pregnant lactate woman
